paragraphs.title: Sparqlify example
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.jena.riot.Lang
import net.sansa_stack.rdf.spark.io._
import net.sansa_stack.query.spark.query._

val input = "hdfs://namenode:8020/data/rdf.nt"
val lang = Lang.NTRIPLES

val triples = spark.rdf(lang)(input)

val sparqlQuery = """SELECT ?s ?p ?o
                            WHERE {?s ?p ?o }
                     LIMIT 10"""
    
val result = triples.sparql(sparqlQuery)
        
z.show(result)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

import net.sansa_stack.rdf.spark.io._

lang: org.apache.jena.riot.Lang = Lang:N-Triples
triples: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.jena.graph.Triple] = MapPartitionsRDD[2] at mapPartitions at NTripleReader.scala:140
sparqlQuery: String =
SELECT ?s ?p ?o
                            WHERE {?s ?p ?o }
                     LIMIT 10

paragraphs.title: Sparqlify Example with SPARQL Endpoint
paragraphs.text:
import scala.collection.mutable

import org.apache.jena.riot.Lang
import net.sansa_stack.rdf.spark.io._
import net.sansa_stack.query.spark.query._
import net.sansa_stack.query.spark.sparqlify.QueryExecutionFactorySparqlifySpark
import net.sansa_stack.query.spark.sparqlify.SparqlifyUtils3
import org.aksw.jena_sparql_api.server.utils.FactoryBeanSparqlServer


val input = "hdfs://namenode:8020/data/rdf.nt"
val triples =  spark.rdf(Lang.NTRIPLES)(input)
val partitions = triples.partitionGraph()

val rewriter = SparqlifyUtils3.createSparqlSqlRewriter(spark, )
    
val port = 7531
    
val qef = new QueryExecutionFactorySparqlifySpark(spark, rewriter)
val server = FactoryBeanSparqlServer.newInstance.setSparqlServiceFactory(qef).setPort(port).create()


server.join()
